info.name: CNAME Fingerprint
author: pdteam
info.description: A CNAME DNS record was discovered.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 19997
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mon-entreprise.urssaf.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 19997
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mon-entreprise.urssaf.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
mon-entreprise.urssaf.fr.	3550	IN	CNAME	www.mon-entreprise.fr.

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
mon-entreprise.fr.	1800	IN	SOA	dns1.p02.nsone.net. hostmaster.nsone.net. 1648225539 43200 7200 1209600 3600
